message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do better than $7000, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $8500?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $7500?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. How about we meet at $8200?
I'm getting close, but I still think I can do better. How about we meet at $7800?
